mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARKING VALUES (#{carNo}, #{carPhone}, 'W', 1, SYSDATE, #{userNo}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT CAR_NO, CAR_PHONE, P.STATUS, CAR_CATEGORY, P.USER_NO, APT_NO FROM PARKING P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND CAR_CATEGORY = 1 AND M.APT_NO = #{aptNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARKING WHERE CAR_CATEGORY = 1
AND STATUS = 'W'
AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CAR_NO, CAR_PHONE, R.STATUS, CAR_CATEGORY, APT_NO, R.USER_NO FROM PARKING R, MEMBER M WHERE R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND CAR_CATEGORY = 1
AND R.STATUS = 'W'
AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY CAR_DATE DESC
